# BooksLibrary ChangeLog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
 
The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/).
 
## [1.0.0] - 2024-07-11

### Added

- Added the recommender system based on `KNN` 
- Added the endpoints using `fastapi` which would interact with the mongoDB 

 ## [1.1.0] - 2025-01-03

### Added

- Added the `test` files
- Added the `sphinx` documents

### Updated

- Updated the module documents for the `main.py`, `recommender.py`
